name: Eli's WordCents adSense Widget with Analytics
author: Eli Scheetz

sections.description:
Just place the Widget on your sidebar to display adSense ads.

Features pop-out display mode for more flexibility in positioning ads on your site.

Now includes customizable Google adSense Analytics on your dashboard (even more customizations coming soon).

Plugin Updated Mar-27th
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin into your WordPress plugins directory (usually /wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
  3. Place the widget on your sidebar through the ‘Widgets’ menu in your WordPress Admin.
sections.faq:
What do I do after I activate the Plugin?

Go to the Widgets menu in the WordPress Admin and add the “WordCents adSense” Widget to your Sidebar or Footer Area.

Why am I not seeing the Widget on my site after I add it to the sidebar?

You might need to adjust the position of the Widget in the individual setting for each Widget to display where you want it to.
sections.changelog:
1.3.03.27

  • Added support for using shortcodes in the widget content area.
  • Fixed the popout feature so that you can turn it off.

1.3.02.27

  • Added category specific code options to the widget so you can use alternate code for certain categories.

1.2.11.09

  • Improved exception handling durring plugin loading of resources.

1.2.09.05

  • Added error/exception handling to the OAuth process.

1.2.09.04

  • Fixed OAuth process from overlapping Token Authentications with other OAuth plugins.

1.2.07.21

  • Added Date Range and Group By to Metric options on Dashboard Analytics Graph.

1.2.06.14

  • Fixed problem with starting the OAuth process.

1.2.06.13

  • Added choice of Metrics to the Dashboard Analytics Graph.

1.2.06.12

  • Added dropdown list of all adUnits and filtered graph by selection.

1.2.06.11

  • Fixed “Cannot modify header information – headers already sent” Error in adSense Analytics Dashboard.

1.2.06.10

  • Added Google adSense Analytics to the dashboard.

1.2.04.10

  • Added more flexibility to the positioning options.

1.2.04.09

  • Added more positioning options.

1.2.04.08

  • Fixed the “code” field to not filter tags.

1.2.03.16

  • First versions uploaded to WordPress.

short_description: Monetize your site with this adSense widget in your sidebar. Featuring pop-out fixed positioned ad widget and customizable adSense Analytics.
